sense.def:
Kadar določeno število oseb
strengthen a group
, naredijo skupino močnejšo s tem, da se ji pridružijo.

seg.quote: The new peers will strengthen the Labour Party in the Upper House.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
strengthens an argument or opinion
, priskrbi več razlogov ali dokazov v podporo neki trditvi ali mnenju.

seg.quote: The uncertainty about the railways strengthened the argument for planning.

sense.def:
Kadar neko čustvo ali odnos
strengthens
ali
is strengthened
, postane intenzivnejši in ima večji vpliv.

seg.quote: During the prolonged depression of the seventies, racialism strengthened.
...countless little cruelties that only strengthened my resolve not to give in.

sense.def:
Kadar neko razmerje
is strengthened
, postane tesnejše.

seg.quote: We want to strengthen our ties with the United States.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
strengthens someone
, poveča človekov pogum in odločnost.

seg.quote: It is designed to strengthen you against the hostile world.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
strengthens an object
, naredi neki predmet sposoben, da prenese grobo ravnanje ali breme.

seg.quote: ...struts designed to strengthen the wings of aeroplanes.
